resources.string: "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS %1$s (CONSTRAINT id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY ,name TEXT, phone_number TEXT ) " "
"CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS %1$s (CONSTRAINT id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY ,invoiceNumber INTEGER ,invoiceDate DATE ,customerName TEXT ,customerAddress TEXT , invoiceAmount INTEGER ,amountDue INTEGER) " "
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS %1$s ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY ,invoiceNumber INTEGER ,invoiceDate DATE ,customerName TEXT ,customerAddress TEXT , invoiceAmount INTEGER ,amountDue INTEGER)
